text: Institut Mines-Télécom is an engineering graduate school in France. It is in a campus of the University of Paris-Saclay (Northern France). Its different curricula lead to the following French & European degrees : * Ingénieur (Graduate engineer Masters level program) * Bachelor's degree * Master's degree * Doctor of Philosophy * Mastères Spécialisés (MS) * Massive Online Open CourseInnovating in a Digital World Academic activities and industrial applied research are performed mainly in French and English languages. Students from a dozen of nationalities participate to the different curricula at IMT. == Research labs == Research activities at Institut Mines-Télécom relate to the following topics: * Energy * Advanced Materials * Natural Resources and the Environment * Economics, management and SocietyLes bonnes recettes de l’Institut Mines-Télécom == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities Category:Universities in Paris Category:1996 establishments in Europe Category:1990s establishments in France
title: Institut Mines-Télécom
